name: Sex Nerd Sandra
bio:
Lighthearted, sex-positive and curiosity driven, I am always amazed at how brilliantly the podcast gives comedian ample material for laughs. Previously co-hosted with Dave Ross,  I explore a topic a week. While comedy leaning myself, I love playing an awkward straight man with naive questions to the many comedians who come on the show. 

Fresh from 2 wonderfully successful shows at SF Sketchfest, one on multiple orgasms and the other on friends with benefits, I'm hoping to do something that even further highlights comedians. I've been wanting to do a show on urban dictionary terms (slightly @midnigh-like) or interview a Portland sex club manager with the help of a few comics. 

I just think it would be silly fun. Plus last time I was there we sold out Dante's, so I know I have an audience at Bridgetown. Thanks for considering!
copy:
Curious about the naughty side of life? Come giggle with Sandra at the cuddly side of the sex pool! Exploring fascinating topics & perspectives on sex & love, join sexuality educator Sandra Daugherty & special guests for a loving laugh at the fundamentals of human nature.

Sandra is known the world over for her podcast, “Sex Nerd Sandra.” At once irreverent and educational, the show has earned a top spot on iTunes. Its loyal listenership (over 8 million downloads) is vocal about Sandra’s impact, describing her as “inspiring” with “contagious enthusiasm” and an “awesome nerd-like ability that [she’s] not afraid to show.” Her weekly podcast has run since 2011 under the Nerdist Industries banner with no end in sight.
